timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,159 @@
+{
+  "title": "must update successfully the respective fields with ACL permissions for a Citizen",
+  "_extends_": "S-582_Update_Case_For_Citizen_Data_Base",
+  "_guid_": "S-582",
+  "specs": [
+    "an active citizen profile in CCD with update permissions for certain fields but not for others in a given case type",
+    "is made to update the document metadata in DocumentField2, which the user has update permissions for",
+    "contains updated values for DocumentField2"
+  ],
+  "user": {
+    "username": "befta.citizen.2@gmail.com",
+    "password": "Pa55word11"
+  },
+  "request": {
+    "body": {
+      "data": {
+        "DocumentField2":{
+          "document_url":"http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/ae5c9e4b-1385-483e-b1b7-607e75dd3943",
+          "document_binary_url":"http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/ae5c9e4b-1385-483e-b1b7-607e75dd3943/binary",
+          "document_filename":"Elastic Search test Case.png --> updated by Citizen"
+        }
+      }
+    }
+  },
+  "expectedResponse": {
+    "responseCode": 201,
+    "responseMessage": "OK",
+    "headers": {
+      "_extends_": "Common_Response_Headers",
+      "Content-Encoding" : "gzip",
+      "vary" : "accept-encoding"
+    },
+    "body" : {
+      "id": "[[ANY]]",
+      "jurisdiction": "BEFTA_JURISDICTION_2",
+      "state": "TODO",
+      "version": "[[ANY]]",
+      "case_type_id": "BEFTA_CASETYPE_2_1",
+      "created_date": "[[ANY]]",
+      "last_modified": "[[ANY]]",
+      "security_classification": "PUBLIC",
+      "case_data": {
+        "DocumentField4": {
+          "document_url": "http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/e56f0aea-4a5f-46d5-82d3-01b536420870",
+          "document_filename": "Screenshot 2019-11-14 at 1.57.32 pm.png",
+          "document_binary_url": "http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/e56f0aea-4a5f-46d5-82d3-01b536420870/binary"
+        },
+        "MoneyGBPField": "111100",
+        "FixedListField": "VALUE3",
+        "AddressUKField": {
+          "County": null,
+          "Country": null,
+          "PostCode": null,
+          "PostTown": null,
+          "AddressLine1": null,
+          "AddressLine2": null,
+          "AddressLine3": null
+        },
+        "DocumentField2": {
+          "document_url": "http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/ae5c9e4b-1385-483e-b1b7-607e75dd3943",
+          "document_filename":"Elastic Search test Case.png --> updated by Citizen",
+          "document_binary_url": "http://dm-store-aat.service.core-compute-aat.internal/documents/ae5c9e4b-1385-483e-b1b7-607e75dd3943/binary"
+        },
+        "ComplexField": {
+          "ComplexTextField": null,
+          "ComplexNestedField": {
+            "NestedNumberField": null,
+            "NestedCollectionTextField": []
+          },
+          "ComplexFixedListField": null
+        },
+        "FixedRadioListField": "RADIOVALUE2",
+        "DateTimeField": null,
+        "PhoneUKField": null,
+        "NumberField": "111111222222",
+        "MultiSelectListField": [
+          "OPTION5",
+          "OPTION4",
+          "OPTION3"
+        ],
+        "YesOrNoField": "Yes",
+        "EmailField": "testemail@gmail.com",
+        "TextField": "sometextfield",
+        "DateField": "2222-01-02",
+        "TextAreaField": "textarea",
+        "CollectionField": []
+      },
+      "data_classification": {
+        "DocumentField4": "PUBLIC",
+        "MoneyGBPField": "PUBLIC",
+        "FixedListField": "PUBLIC",
+        "AddressUKField": {
+          "classification": "PUBLIC",
+          "value": {
+            "County": "PUBLIC",
+            "Country": "PUBLIC",
+            "PostCode": "PUBLIC",
+            "PostTown": "PUBLIC",
+            "AddressLine1": "PUBLIC",
+            "AddressLine2": "PUBLIC",
+            "AddressLine3": "PUBLIC"
+          }
+        },
+        "DocumentField2": "PUBLIC",
+        "FixedRadioListField": "PUBLIC",
+        "DateTimeField": "PUBLIC",
+        "PhoneUKField": "PUBLIC",
+        "NumberField": "PUBLIC",
+        "MultiSelectListField": "PUBLIC",
+        "YesOrNoField": "PUBLIC",
+        "EmailField": "PUBLIC",
+        "TextField": "PUBLIC",
+        "DateField": "PUBLIC",
+        "TextAreaField": "PUBLIC",
+        "CollectionField": {

+          "value": []
+        }
+      },

timeline.message: Merge branches 'RDM-6155_Functional_TA_Umbrella_Epic' and 'RDM-7072-FTA-f-056' of https://github.com/hmcts/ccd-data-store-api into RDM-7072-FTA-f-056
